article_title: A Compromise On The Affordable Care Act

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: BY DAVID BEIER - The issues at stake in the currently pending Supreme Court case are vital to both parties. But because no one can know or predict the outcome, perhaps now is the time for the parties to compromise legislatively and avoid allowing the Supreme Court to insert itself into the business of setting or altering public policy choices best left to the political branches.
